long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DIRETO: YouTube™ AdBlock is a lightweight extension that skips annoying ads instantly, allowing you to enjoy uninterrupted video content.

If you encounter any issues, make sure to deactivate any other AdBlock for YouTube™ and restart your browser.
